original_text: They will say, ‘This land was like a desert, but now it is like the Garden of Eden. People now live in the cities that had become heaps of stones. The cities now have strong walls.’
korean_text: 사람이 이르기를 이 땅이 황폐하더니 이제는 에덴 동산 같이 되었고 황량하고 적막하고 무너진 성읍들에 성벽과 주민이 있다 하리니

sentences.original_text: but now it is like the Garden of Eden.
People now live in the cities
that had become heaps of stones.
The cities now have strong walls.'
sentences.korean_translation: 도시들은 이제 견고한 성벽을 갖추고 있다.'
